overview:
Greg is one of three founding partners of Liquify Digital, a Seattle-based mobile development company who debuted their first product, Mynd, in October of 2011. Previous to this, Greg was Principal and Executive Producer at Myndcast Media, a media consulting company which helped companies creatively monetize their web properties.

Greg was one of the three original founders of the sports content network, TheInsiders, which later became Scout Media and was purchased by Fox Interactive in the summer of 2006. Just before co-founding TheInsiders, Greg headed up the national interactive sales division for the aggregated niche sports network, Rivals.com. He consulted motorsports teams in Formula One and NASCAR on the principles of sponsorship valuations and branding opportunities both on and off the track and spent over three years generating new sponsorship and broadcast partnerships for the Seattle SuperSonics NBA franchise in the mid to late nineties. Greg launched his career in the branded entertainment space coordinating such successful international cross-promotions as the infamous â€œCadillacâ€ Seinfeld episode and Ray-Ban Sunglasses with both Men in Black films.

Greg holds a BS in Behavioral Psychology and Marketing Management from Oregon State University and is married with two children.
